column4: I've downloaded the beta and it works fine, if a little slow. The only problem was, it crashed during a session, so I restarted. When I start Ubuntu again, however, it makes me log in. But I don't know the password for the root account! Will I have to re-burn my CD?
Or is there a default password for root?
Does sudo have the same priveliges as root?
it depends who the user is
